channel.title: Blog on Emily's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Emily's Blog

item.title: That's how you do it!
item.description: Recently, I helped my friend create her own official career website. With no coding background, her career is at an early stage with limited funding. How not to spend big money to have your own professional official site? The cheapest and most efficient way I’ve ever worked is the Google site. An Easy Way To Build Your Own Website, No Coding Required. You can even add embed code so that your site looks rich, for example, timeline, store… etc.

item.title: What is BG5‚Ñ¢?
How do I set up my own website (1)
item.description: I always had the idea to create a personal website. It wasn’t until I moved to Norway last year that I got to thinking. What did I figure out? The niche of the website The name of the website How the website is set up The niche of the website The original idea is to begin with the service. But without the “core”, where did you get the service? And what’s the “core”?

item.title: 2021 Happy Lantern Festival!
item.description: Happy Lantern Festival! I made 3 lanterns this year. I love myself of focusing on making handwork. It’s so healing üòä
